condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: Capacity development, assessment and thematic support are some of the key ways the Global Education Cluster supported Country Clusters and Working Groups coordinate timely, quality, appropriate, effective and accountable education responses in 2021. 171 coordination staff and partners gained the knowledge and skills to coordinate effective education responses by participating in 7 Core Coordination Training organized in 2021.; T Strengthened thematic support in areas such as Cash and Voucher assistance enabled the GEC to strengthen awareness of innovative modalities country teams and partners can leverage to meet education needs of children. | Status:Met | As-of Date:23/03/2022
